SEARCH
Package dev.zpo.repository

Interface SubjectRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Subject,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Subject,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Subject,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Subject,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Subject,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Subject>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Subject,Long>
@Repository public interface SubjectRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Subject,Long>
Repository interface for accessing and managing Subject entities in the database. This interface extends the JpaRepository interface, providing basic CRUD operations for Subject entities out of the box.

The repository is responsible for managing interactions between the application and the database. It includes custom methods for finding subjects by ID, deleting subjects by ID, and executing custom queries to retrieve subjects and their associated grades.

Since:
2024-02-08
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ronald Frangulyan

    • findBySubjectId

      Subject findBySubjectId(Long subjectId)
      Find a subject by its ID.
      Parameters:
      subjectId - The ID of the subject to find.
      Returns:

      Parameters:

    • findSubjectsAndGradesForStudent

      @Query("SELECT s.studentId, s.studentName, s.studentSurname, g.subjectId, sub.subjectName, g.grade, g.id FROM Student s JOIN Grade g ON s.studentId = g.studentId JOIN Subject sub ON g.subjectId = sub.subjectId WHERE s.studentId = :studentId") List<Object[]> findSubjectsAndGradesForStudent(@Param("studentId") Long studentId)
      Retrieve a list of subjects along with their grades for a given student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student.
      Returns:
      A list of arrays containing subject details and associated grades.

    • findSubjectsAndAverageGrades

      @Query("SELECT s.subjectId, s.subjectName, AVG(g.grade) FROM Subject s JOIN Grade g ON s.subjectId = g.subjectId GROUP BY s.subjectName") List<Object[]> findSubjectsAndAverageGrades()
      Retrieve a list of subjects along with their average grades.
      Returns:
      A list of arrays containing subject details and average grades.
